title: A String Of Really Bad Luck? American Monster Death Row Granny
description:
Hi Friends!
Today on Murder, Mystery & Makeup, I wanted to talk about Margie Velma Bullard Barfield. Whew weee, she sure did do some damage for a long time. I believe all the fires, were her. All the husbands/boyfriends, were her. The people she took “care of”, yeah, I think she was responsible for all the chaos that was happening around her. Sad that it took so long for anyone to catch on.
Love you so much and please be safe out there! Hope to be seeing you very soon
x o
Bailey Sarian

Watch the original video here and don't forget to subscribe to my YouTube @BaileySarian!
